title: ServiceNow Developer
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.ServiceNow ITSM business analyst / developer
Key responsibilities 
 

Enable system processes to support business and corporate strategies and objectives
Meet with stakeholders to review business challenges, and design solutions that continuously deliver incremental business value
Review out of the box ServiceNow apps and features and ensure fit with business requirements – make educated build vs. buy decisions
Perform troubleshooting as required. As such, leads problem-solving efforts include involving outside vendors
Administer ServiceNow platform, including cloning, upgrades, and MID server maintenance
Learning the application constantly and keep up to date expected abilities  
Be proactive

 
 
 Requirements:
 

Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering, Management, Computer Science or other related field​
At least 2 years of experience on the ServiceNow platform -  as a business developer / admin
Hands-on experience with all aspects of the platform, include client-side scripts, server-side scripts, security rules, email notifications, etc.
Excellent knowledge of ServiceNow best practices and ongoing knowledge of latest ServiceNow features
Independent, autodidact and quick learner
Ability to work collaboratively as well as independently, with proven ability to form strong partnerships with key stakeholders​
Ability to multi-task across a range of work streams/projects with constantly shifting priorities​
Passion for excellence, highly self-motivated and has the desire to have a significant impact on the business
Excellent service orientation​
Experience in global companies – an advantage
English- fluent (mandatory)
About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
